# Performance-optimized .gitignore additions
# Add these entries to your .gitignore if not already present

# VS Code performance cache
.eslintcache
.vscode-test/
*.vsix

# Performance logs
logs/*.log
logs/*.audit.json

# Node performance caches
.npm/
.cache/
coverage/
dist/
build/

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/
*.tmp
*.temp

# Large data files that shouldn't be in git
data/*.jsonl
data/*.dat
data/*.json.bak

# OS performance files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
